name: Platformer (msed2k)
description:
Welcome to the Platformer Game!

WASD to move, space to jump and while in the air you will have 
access to a double jump by pressing left shift to elevate yourself even further.
Note that you can't use this ability while on the ground and when walking off
a surface dont have access to your normal jump, so keep the double jump in mind!

after going forward for a short while you'll find a flag, find 3 teleporter keys with that face that's
on the flag and you'll open the golden door and be rich! that's all there is to it, good luck! 

Pay attention to coins as they guide your way sometimes.
